Description:
IOException when debug report with event handler.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Debug birt report using attached report and java class in bug #137889.

Expected result:
NO Exception.

Actual result:
Report preview is ok but throw IOException.
Same result as decribed in bug 137889.

Error logs:
